name: Fosforo - Connecticut Robusto
additionalNotes: Phosphor cigars is a brand of fresh boutique cigars distributed by Pospiech Inc (powstanie Cigars). The brand offers a wide variety of cigars to satisfy the palates of its consumers such as your Maduro cigar with its blend and full body. For those who are looking for a medium body option and a unique experience Match Cigars offers the Connecticut Limited that is characterized by being a pure balanced and luxurious. In addition to selling products of the best quality, phosphorus cigars stand out for their wide variety of flavors and aromas, perfect even for the most experienced smokers.
